metadata.name: Application Terminated Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects calls to the "terminate" function via wmic in order to kill an application

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('terminate')))

output.summary: Detects calls to the "terminate" function via wmic in order to kill an application
